job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtwe are looking for a ltstronggtsoftware engineer ltstronggtwho can create a series of extensions for visual studio code vscode for a unique declarative language we have created you will be an integral part of helping us promote this new declarative programming language ensuring it is simple and accessible for our customers we are looking for candidates who are passionate about working on developer productivity aids like deeply contextsensitive suggestions and sourcelevel debugging for this language based on the llvm toolset ideal candidates will be active in one or more of these open source communities and will be able to showcase their proficiency with their contributionsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtskills required for this role includeltpgtltpgt experience with vscode extensionsltpgtltpgt strong javascripttypescriptltpgtltpgt strong c skillsltpgtltpgt experience with llvm a plusltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtwe are a bellevue wa startup and were building our company from the ground up our founders david vaskevitch mehtap ozkan and hal berenson have a history of industrychanging successes in enterprise software with many years of technical leadership experience at both microsoft amazon and other startups very soon well be surrounded by selfdirected computers operating as delivery drones autonomous inspection robots air taxis smart grid controllers and other iot devices this will require an enormous amount of new software but writing it wont be easy programmers need new tools to help them reach the edge wrangle complexity and integrate the latest advances from machine learning and robotics gaia platform provides that platform that will empower programmers and subject matter experts to rapidly deliver highperformance maintainable applications at the edge and beyond the cloudltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtno visa assistance is availableltpgt
